# Process data

## Libraries

```{r libs}
library(dplyr)
library(xlsx)
```

## Read in tsv

```{r read_tsv}
sanity <- read.table("sanity.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE, quote="ยง", comment.char="^")
# Sanitize some extra output
for(col in 1:ncol(sanity)){
  sanity[,col] <- gsub(": |<|>", "", sanity[,col])
}

# Inspect
head(sanity)
tail(sanity)

# Subset according to model

sanity_kimi <- sanity %>% filter(model == "moonshotai/kimi-k2-instruct")
sanity_o1 <- sanity %>% filter(model == "opeanai/o1")
```
